message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $12,000. This is a fair offer for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
